name: Compactor Bot Escape
description:
Wake up! Attempt to escape a Garbage Compactor Area of an abandoned lab of an undisclosed name. Uncover the story of what caused the collapse and try to make your way out to find out more about what came of the world outside. Do you have what it takes to escape that forsaken place?

This is the Ludum Dare 42 entry by Siarhei Pilat.

PS. This is my 1st Ludum Dare, yaaaay! <3

Link to Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/compactor-bot-escape
